backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report specifying UI text replacement and listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of auto‑generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens defining light/dark themes and global design variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the Maui Lane Care Home title, favicon, root mount point, and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router, React Query, authentication gate, and main routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication wrapper that shows a login screen until Internet Identity login completes.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Main layout shell providing header, navigation, footer, and content outlet with sign‑out support.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with Dashboard and Reference Capture links and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Dialog for adding a new resident with extensive multi‑section form state and validation handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog for editing resident information with form validation, physician list editing, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays a resident card with details, status badges, and actions like view, discharge, and delete.
Header component showing the residents page title and an add-resident button.
Provides UI controls for filtering residents by room and sorting by room, name, or age.
Renders a responsive grid of ResidentCard components or an empty-state message.
Shows KPI cards for total, active, and discharged residents.
Tab selector for filtering residents by status: All, Active, or Discharged.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Displays a placeholder card listing missing reference materials with a link to a full checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks interacting with the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom light/dark themes and print-specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the resident dashboard with filtering, sorting, KPIs, and add-resident dialog using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data and a helper to fetch medications for a given resident.
Generates a mock detailed resident profile based on basic resident info including physicians, pharmacy, and insurance.
Defines mock resident list data used for the dashboard and profile lookups.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Contains filtering, sorting, KPI computation, and room extraction utilities for resident lists.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Displays a resident's full profile with tabs, medications, editing, and print functionality using mocked data.
Renders a printable resident profile report including personal, insurance, and medication details.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: Displays a structured checklist of reference materials required to recreate the Maui Lane Care Home UI.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color variables, extended theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing build goals and a list of implemented features for the Maui Lane Care Home application.
